magicdirt.title: Magic Dirt
magicdirt.description: 50% chance to make all stats at least 90% every 5th customer.
magicdirt.quote: Sourced from someone with a conical purple hat.

stevenswish.title: Steven's Wish
stevenswish.description: tip modifier by x1.4 on even days.
stevenswish.quote: And for half of eternity it was granted.

toddsrequest.title: Todd's Request
toddsrequest.quote: I never wanted to be odd, it just happened.

burgerpolish.title: Burger Polish
burgerpolish.description: +3% increase in presentation on all orders.

pragmaticparty.title: Pragmatic Party
pragmaticparty.quote: A taste of HR's company pizza party.

thewhisk.title: The Whisk
thewhisk.description: 30% chance of tip modifier by x2 customer's average standards.
thewhisk.quote: An instrument of great kitchen potential.

bofoundation.title: The Bo Foundation
bofoundation.description: tips get +$800/(the number of letters in a customer's name).
bofoundation.quote: Take pride in your name and it's length.

aqualificprism.title: Aqualific Prism
aqualificprism.description: 1% chance you don't lose a life from a failed order.
aqualificprism.quote: Life begins right where it ends.

killercheddar.title: Killer Cheddar
killercheddar.description: 20% chance a rat infestation is dealt with.
killercheddar.quote: You offer sustenance with strings attached.

alittlehelp.title: A Little Help
alittlehelp.description: every rat in your kitchen gives +4% punctuality.
alittlehelp.quote: Let me get that for you.

cryochamber.title: Cryochamber
cryochamber.description: customer's punctuality standards are dropped by 4%.
cryochamber.quote: Developed by Slorg's Truth Architect Team. Your customers are unaware of how long it's been.

burgertime.title: Burger Time
burgertime.description: +2% punctuality for each ingredient on the burger.

scentedbounce.title: Scented Bounce
scentedbounce.description: +1% presentation for each bouncy ball in your kitchen.
scentedbounce.quote: The smell of rubber is not appetizing.

rcpattyperm.title: Regenerative Rad Cow
rcpattyperm.description: rad cow patties are permanently added to your kitchen.
rcpattyperm.quote: Straight from Slorg Labs. You harvest beef when needed.

bottomfeeder.title: Bottom Feeder
bottomfeeder.description: placing produce on the bottom of the burger will give x1.2 precision.

sauceshow.title: Sauce Show
sauceshow.description: sauce placed on the top and bottom of the burger gives x1.3 presentation.
sauceshow.quote: Grab a bottle or a packet. Watch.

glumtrident.title: Glum Trident
glumtrident.description: +1% precision for every glum devil you have.
glumtrident.quote: You know they're armed now right?

bouncezine.title: The Bounce Zine
bouncezine.description: 20% chance of a free bouncy ball each day.
bouncezine.quote: Filled with bouncy poems and fresh new ball designs.

rcpatty.title: 70% Beef Rad Cow Patty
rcpatty.description: +20% presentation when substituting a beef patty.

condimentcaroler.title: Condiment Caroler
condimentcaroler.description: increases pleasantry by +1% for every condiment ordered.
condimentcaroler.quote: From the tops of mustard mountains the hot honey horn can be heard.

glumdevil.title: Glorp Mart's Glum Devils
glumdevil.quote: In an altercation earlier today over the coveted 'Secret' Glum Devil a man died. More on this at 7.

slorgplush.title: Slorg's Plush
slorgplush.quote: They wanted a less human face to the company.

uraniumdistraction.title: Uranium Distraction
uraniumdistraction.description: for ever rc patty in your kitchen, a rat will slowly eat it -5% from it's effects.

lessismore.title: Less Is More
lessismore.description: One less ingredient on every order.

theshrine.title: Shrine of Rodent
theshrine.description: $5 on each order for every rat in the kitchen.
